message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you this great product at a special price. I think you'll really love it! I'm willing to let it go for $180.
I'm really interested in the product, but $180 is a bit out of my budget. I was thinking more along the lines of $120. Would you be willing to meet me in the middle at $150?

I appreciate your interest in the product, Bob! However, I'm not sure I can meet you at $150. I'm willing to come down to $160, but that's as low as I can go. I think you'll find it's a great value at this price!

I appreciate your willingness to come down to $160, Alice, but I'm still a bit short on budget. I'm willing to meet you halfway from $120, which is my original target price. Would you be willing to sell it to me for $140?
